items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.
items.title: actioncrew/streamix: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.

items.content_html: A lightweight, cross-platform JavaScript/TypeScript library to create and manage Solana wallets. Supports wallet generation from seed phrases, SOL transfers, balance checking, and random wallet creation ‚Äî compatible with React.js, React Native, and Node.js.
items.title: faheemwakee24/solana-multi-wallet-kit: A lightweight, cross-platform JavaScript/TypeScript library to create and manage Solana wallets. Supports wallet generation from seed phrases, SOL transfers, balance checking, and random wallet creation ‚Äî compatible with React.js, React Native, and Node.js.

items.title: Vlad345345/bs-progressbar: Lightweight JavaScript overlay progress bar as a singleton utility

items.content_html: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
items.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.

items.content_html: üßà ButterPop.js - A lightweight (<100KB), zero-dependency toast notification library with 23 beautiful themes. Create smooth, customizable notifications with flexible positioning, progress indicators, and interactive elements. Modern, accessible, and easy to integrate into any project.

items.content_html: A feature-rich portal to chat with GPT-4, Claude, Gemini, Mistral, & OpenAI Assistant APIs via a lightweight Node.js web app; supports customizable multimodality for voice, images, & files.
